name: Space Jump (John Peres)
description:
This is an Endless Runner game that in order to to survive you have to jump, attract or repel platforms!

Help the astronaut and his drone to explore a chaotic world...

Instructions:

  •  W, UP or Space to Jump
  • A or Left to attract the metal platforms
  • S or Right to repel the metal platforms

Credits:

  • Music: 8Bit Color Codes Game Music-Vol 1
  • I used LootLockers' leaderboard for highscores

Thanks for playing!
